item.title: Julia + Weave.jl + hugo test
item.description: Testing the Hugo formatter for Weave.jl. Testing inline code: 1+1=2. Testing math: $$x^2+y^2 = \int_0^1 f(z) dz$$ Testing code: 1+1 2 Testing proper highlighting: function foo(x, y) x+y end A plot: x = 1:10 y = x.^2 scatter(x, y, legend = false) Caption for this plot
